articles.author: Scott Horsley
articles.title: Discounting is back in fashion, as Americans get tired of paying more - NPR
articles.description: Consumer spending rose only slightly in April, as shoppers pushed back against rising prices.
articles.content:
After two years of paying more for things, Americans are growing more cautious about how they spend their money and are forcing retailers to offer more discounts.
Target and Walmart are rolling back… [+3456 chars]

articles.title: Jennifer Lopez cancels 2024 North American tour - The Associated Press
articles.description: Jennifer Lopez has canceled her 2024 North American tour. Representatives for Live Nation confirmed the cancellation to The Associated Press. “Jennifer is taking time off to be with her children, family and close friends,” they say in a statement. The tour wa…
articles.content:
NEW YORK (AP) Jennifer Lopez has canceled her 2024 North American tour, representatives for Live Nation confirmed to The Associated Press.
